predicate.note: Frames file for 'totter' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: poor John
example.text: After a round of Mary's skull-splitting cocktails, John was tottering like a baby.
example.arg: After a round of Mary's skull-splitting cocktails

example.name: WSJ waxes eloquent
example.text: Inexplicably costumed as a rabbinical student, *trace* tottering around on lifts, Mr. Shicoff hardly seemed the fellow to catch a fancy cocotte's eye.
